channel.title: Arrav Development
channel.description:
[center] [b] [COLOR=green]Green - Completed[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Orange - In Progress[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Red - Not Started[/COLOR][/b]
[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/0/00/Attack.png[/img] [size=18pt]Combat:[/size] [B][COLOR=green]Entity based combat system[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Melee/Range Maxhit formula[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Combat Following[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Projectile Support[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Equipment Requirements[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Relatiation Equipment E.G Recoil rings[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Poison Support[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Spirit Shield Effects[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Equipment Effects [E.G Barrows][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All specials attacks[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Three spellbooks[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Degradable Equipment[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Newest Hitmarks[/COLOR][/B]
[size=18pt]Special Attacks[/size] Note: All specials attacks will have their full working, they will drain stats if needed, increase stats, heal HP, everything. [B][COLOR=green]Dragon Dagger[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dragon Mace[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Godswords[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Magic bows[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dragon Battleaxe[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Granite Maul[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dragon Claws[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dragon 2H[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dragon Longsword[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Barrelchest Anchor[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Vesta's longsword[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Statius' Warhammer[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Whip[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Emerald bolts(e)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Ruby bolts(e)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Diamond bolts(e)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dragon bolts(e)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Onyx bolts(e)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dragon Scimitar[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dragon hatchet[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dragon Pickaxe[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dragon spear[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Granite mace [/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Magic longbow[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Morrigan's throwing axe[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Zamorakian spear[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Staff of Light[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Enhanced Excalibur[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Saradomin sword[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dragon Halberd[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Bone dagger[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dark Bow[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Topaz bolts(e)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Sapphire bolts(e)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Morrigan's javalin[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Korasi's Sword - Works magic based during special attack.[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Vesta's spear[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Hand cannon[/COLOR]
[/B]
[size=18pt]Skills!!![/size]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120224163119/runescape/images/3/32/Prayer.png[/img] Prayer :
Regular Prayer: [B][COLOR=green]Prayers up to #474[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]New prayers such as Rigour.[/COLOR][/B] [B][COLOR=red]Quick Prayers[/COLOR][/B]
Ancient Curses: [B][COLOR=green]Turmoil[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]SoulSplit[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Berserker[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Deflection Curses[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Leech Prayers[/COLOR][/B] [B][COLOR=red]Quick-Curses[/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120119045123/runescape/images/0/0c/Fletching.png[/img] Fletching: [B][COLOR=green]Arrow Shafts[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Fletching bows; Longbows and Shortbows[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Bolt Making[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dart Making[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Arrow Making[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Stringing Bows[/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120224022602/runescape/images/5/5a/Runecrafting.png[/img] Runecrafting: [B][COLOR=green]Altar Locating with Talisman[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Making Runes[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Essence Pouches[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Abyss[/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120224162953/runescape/images/1/14/Agility.png[/img]
Agility: [B][COLOR=green]Force Movement[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Gnome Agility Course[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Brimhaven Agility Course[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Wilderness Agility Course[/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221055812/runescape/images/f/ff/Crafting.png[/img]
Crafting: [B][COLOR=green]Flax Picking[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Tanning Support[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Jewelry Crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Leather Crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Gem[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Bow Stringing[/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221055330/runescape/images/b/bf/Herblore.png[/img]
Herblore: [B][COLOR=green]Cleaning of Herbs[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Potion Making - Lacks a few high revision pots. [COLOR=red]Ingredient Grinding[/COLOR][/B] [/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120225193919/runescape/images/6/6e/Slayer.png[/img]
Slayer: [B][COLOR=green]Support for multiple slayer masters[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Enchanted Gem[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Multiple Task Levels[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Slayer Helm Support[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Full Slayer Tower[/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120223124331/runescape/images/1/18/Farming.png[/img]
Farming: [B][COLOR=red]Still Everything to do[/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120116165812/runescape/images/1/1b/Summoning.png[/img]
Summoning: [B][COLOR=green]Filled in all definitions for all summoning monsters. [normal npcdefs][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All correct specific summoning definitions such as charm requirements. [/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Special effects of familiars[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Use of correct interfaces etc.[/COLOR] http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=grSriUwmi94 [/B]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120118045828/runescape/images/3/37/Construction.png[/img]
Construction: [B][COLOR=red]Still Everything to do[/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120223124113/runescape/images/1/15/Dungeoneering.png[/img]
Dungeoneering: [B][COLOR=red]Still Everything to do[/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120223123942/runescape/images/4/41/Mining.png[/img]
Mining: [B][COLOR=green]All Ores Work[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Random chance to get a gem.[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Object Updates - Ores can go off etc[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Prospecting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All pickaxes[/COLOR] [/B]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120224163230/runescape/images/d/df/Woodcutting.png[/img]
Woodcutting: [B][COLOR=green]All Trees Work[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Object Updates - Trees turn into Stumps[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All Axes[/COLOR] [/B]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120116164956/runescape/images/2/2c/Firemaking.png[/img]
Firemaking: [B][COLOR=green]Clipping Support[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Backwards Lighting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All Logs[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Turning Into Ash Support[/COLOR] [/B]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120118045139/runescape/images/f/f4/Cooking.png[/img]
Cooking: [B][COLOR=green]Cooking on Ranges[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Cooking on fires[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All needed foods.[/COLOR] [/B]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120223124733/runescape/images/f/f4/Thieving.png[/img]
Thieving: [B][COLOR=green]Npc Pickpocketing[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Stunning Support[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Stall Thieving[/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120116165214/runescape/images/1/19/Fishing.png[/img]
Fishing: [B][COLOR=green]Correct Requirements[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Different Styles, Cage, Harpoon etc..[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Speed increases if higher level[/COLOR] [/B]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120119045449/runescape/images/8/84/Smithing.png[/img]
Smithing: [B][COLOR=green]Interface updates correctly[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Smelting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct Requirements for each piece of equipment[/COLOR] [/B]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120224162614/runescape/images/4/4b/Hunter.png[/img]
Hunter: [B][COLOR=red]Still everything to do[/COLOR] [/B]
[size=18pt]Minigames!!![/size] [IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111130111255/runescape/images/thumb/b/bc/Void_outpost_logo.png/75px-Void_outpost_logo.png[/img]
Pest Control: [COLOR=green]Traveling with the boat[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]All 4 portals being spawned[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Skiller part, E.G repairing barricades[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]All npcs have their effects, E.G Spinners healing[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Npc VS NPC[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120131141443/runescape/images/thumb/7/7f/Warriors%27_Guild_builiding.png/180px-Warriors%27_Guild_builiding.png[/img]
Warriors Guild: [COLOR=red]Animator Room[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Cyclops being spawned[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Gaining Defenders[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]2ND floor[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110115212702/runescape/images/thumb/6/6d/Duel_Arena.png/180px-Duel_Arena.png[/img]
Duel Arena: [COLOR=red]Opening Duel Screen[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Setting Rules[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Offering Items[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Enforcing Rules[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Combat inside the arena[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Claiming rewards[/COLOR]
Bounty Hunter: [COLOR=red]Entering the 3 different craters, with combat enforcement[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Assigning targets[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Penalties[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120321192628/runescape/images/thumb/6/68/CastleWarsbanner.png/180px-CastleWarsbanner.png[/img]
Castle Wars: [COLOR=red]Entering the lobbies[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Teleport to game room[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Updating the objects, and flag capturing[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]All effects, barricades etc[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120112092438/runescape/images/thumb/e/e6/Civilwar2nd.png/180px-Civilwar2nd.png[/img]
Clan Wars: [COLOR=red]Load the maps[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Two different are able to set up themselves[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Teleport to the bases[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Options to select safe mode etc...[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]The fighting[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120104154310/runescape/images/thumb/3/37/Barrows_entrance.png/200px-Barrows_entrance.png[/img]
Barrows: [COLOR=red]Digging inside the rooms[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Spawning the brothers[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Puzzles[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Rewards[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Menu Teleporting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dicing[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Jewelry Teleporting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]SQL Saving[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Ipb Forums license bought- IP Board Installed[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Website based control panel for ingame accounts[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Clan Chat[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Party Room[/COLOR]
[B]Client information : [COLOR=orange]Perfect Positioning[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Support for multiple gameframes[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]668 Animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]668 Npcs[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]668 Items[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]New Hitmarks[/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/opH8[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/oTnA[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/oTon[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/oTtW[/img]
[B]More media will be posted soon![/B]
[/center]

item.title: Arrav Development
item.dc:creator: @nick55555 nick55555
item.description:
@nick55555 wrote:

nice looking server. im a coder myself so if you would like some help on this project let me know. because i would love to be part of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Arrav Development
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:12, topic:441040”]Off topic, how much does he pay you?
You keep going back to him yet you say he’s ratted you? I just can’t contemplate why you would still work for him…
Not my business though I suppose.[/quote]
Rene has never once ratted me and he doesn’t pay me anything. We are just friends.

[quote=“Fridder, post:13, topic:441040”]What base is this? Delta?
Looks awesome so far, good luck with the development.[/quote]
Not sure if the base comment was serious but it is a custom one made fully by Rene.

Read full topic
